I1.name: Fey Feathers
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Rakan''' generates a {{pp|30 to 225}} {{as|(+ 85% AP)}} {{tip|shield}} that lasts until broken. After being [[out of combat]] for 5 seconds, any leftover shield will be restored to '''maximum''' value.
'''Rakan's''' basic attacks and ability hits {{sti|cdr|reduce}} ''Fey Feathers' '' cooldown by 1 second for each enemy {{tip|champion}} hit.

{{sbc|Innate - Lover's Leap:}} If either '''Rakan''' or {{ci|Xayah}} is channeling {{si|Recall}}, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. '''Both''' reach base at the time of which the initiator's {{si|Recall}} completes.
I1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Rakan generates a 30 − 225 (based on level) (+ 85% AP) shield that lasts until broken. After being out of combat for 5 seconds, any leftover shield will be restored to maximum value.
Rakan's basic attacks and ability hits reduce Fey Feathers' cooldown by 1 second for each enemy champion hit.
Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Rakan or Xayah is channeling Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's Recall completes.
I1.notes:
* {{ri|Revitalize}} will record bonus shielding when a new shield is created, but not when it regenerates. In either case, there is no bonus shielding received.
* The cooldown reduction is granted even if the ability is blocked by a {{tip|spell shield}}.

Q.name: Gleaming Quill
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit.

If the target was an enemy {{tip|champion}} or epic {{tip|monster}}, a radius is marked around '''Rakan'''. After 3 seconds or if an allied champion enters the radius, '''Rakan''' {{tip|heals}} himself and nearby allied champions for {{pp|30 to 115}} {{as|(+ 55% AP)}}.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
If the target was an enemy champion or epic monster, a radius is marked around Rakan. After 3 seconds or if an allied champion enters the radius, Rakan heals himself and nearby allied champions for 30 − 115 (based on level) (+ 55% AP).
Q.notes:
* The trigger radius is slightly smaller than the heal radius.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the marked area from being formed.
* The heal can activate immediately after the projectile hits the target, before the healing return animation completes.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* The heal will trigger and affect '''Rakan''' even if he is {{tip|untargetable}}.

W.name: Grand Entrance
description: After a {{fd|0.35}}-second delay upon arrival, he deals {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for 1 second.
'''''Rakan''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} or {{tip|polymorph|polymorphing}} crowd control, excluding {{tip|sleep}}{{bug}}, during Grand Entrance.''
''Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rakan dashes to the target location.
After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1 second.
Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleepUnknown value: bug, during Grand Entrance.
Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

E1.name: Battle Dance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' {{tip|shield|shields}} the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then {{tip|dash|dashes}} to and around them. ''Battle Dance'' can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
'''''Rakan''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} or {{tip|polymorph|polymorphing}} crowd control, excluding {{tip|sleep}}{{bug}}, during Battle Dance.''
''If {{ci|Xayah}} is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased {{sti|range}}.''
E1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rakan shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
Recast: Rakan mimics the first cast's effects.
Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleepUnknown value: bug, during Battle Dance.
If Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased range.
E1.notes:
*Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The shields do not stack if ''Battle Dance'' is cast on the same target twice. Only the duration and shield amount is refreshed.

R.name: The Quickness
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rakan''' breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|75% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and becoming {{tip|ghosted}} for the duration. During this time, '''Rakan''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies he collides with and {{tip|charm|charms}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.

Colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}} extends ''The Quickness' ''duration by {{fd|0.25}} seconds, which can occur once per champion. When '''Rakan''' collides with his first enemy {{tip|champion}}, he gains an additional {{sti|ms|{{as|75% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays after {{fd|0.5}} seconds by 20% every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, then by 15% after decaying by 60% over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''During The Quickness, '''Rakan''' cannot [[basic attack]] enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.''
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining 75% bonus movement speed and becoming ghosted for the duration. During this time, Rakan deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and charms and slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
Colliding with an enemy champion extends The Quickness' duration by 0.25 seconds, which can occur once per champion. When Rakan collides with his first enemy champion, he gains an additional 75% bonus movement speed that decays after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds, then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.
During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.
